other_title: 合身戦隊メカンダーロボ (Japanese)
plot: The Doron forces from the Ganymede system invade Earth and conquer 95% of it within a matter of days. To combat the threat, Dr. Shikishima creates the giant robot Mechander Robo and entrusts it to three brave pilots as Earth's last hope.
opening_theme: "Il fantastico Mechander Robot" by Santo Verduci [2015 Italian version]
"Mechander Robot" by Fratelli Balestra [Italian DVD verison]
"「トライアタック! メカンダーロボ」 Tri-Attack! Mechander Robo" by Ichiro Mizuki and Columbia Yurikago-kai
ending_theme: "「さすらいの星 ジミーオリオン」 Sasurai no Hoshi (Roaming Star), Jimmy Orion" by Ichiro Mizuki
